content: Who painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City, which includes the famous scene "The Creation of Adam"?

The artist who painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City, including the iconic scene "The Creation of Adam," is Michelangelo Buonarroti. This masterpiece was created between 1508 and 1512, and it's renowned for its detailed frescoes depicting various biblical scenes and figures.ชั่วโมง
